Protocols/XMLCodable.html.name: XMLCodable
Protocols/XMLCodable.html.abstract: protocol to return XMLContainerCoding values. To control how the child elements of a Codable class are encoded inherit from this and return coding values for each

Enums/XMLContainerCoding.html#/s:11xml_e.name: default
Enums/XMLContainerCoding.html#/s:11xml_e.abstract: default case, flat arrays and coding dictionaries like all other codable structures

Enums/XMLContainerCoding.html#/s:11xml_e.name: array(entry:)
Enums/XMLContainerCoding.html#/s:11xml_e.abstract: case for coding arrays. where there is an enclosing xml element and each array element has name is defined by element. eg 12

Enums/XMLContainerCoding.html#/s:11xml_e.name: structure
Enums/XMLContainerCoding.html#/s:11xml_e.abstract: case for coding dictionaries where key element contains the value. Encoding like a struct or class where the keys are the variable names. This is only valid for dictionaries that have keys of type ‘String’ eg valuevalue2

Enums/XMLContainerCoding.html#/s:11xml_e.name: dictionary(entry:key:value:)
Enums/XMLContainerCoding.html#/s:11xml_e.abstract: case for coding dictionaries where key and value are stored in separate elements and these can be either stored as children of the dictionary element or as children of a enclosing entry element which is then stored under the dictionary element eg nameJohn Smith……

Enums/XMLContainerCoding.html.name: XMLContainerCoding
Enums/XMLContainerCoding.html.abstract: rules for encoding/decoding containers like arrays and dictionaries.

Classes/XMLEncoder/NonConformingFloatEnc.name: throw
Classes/XMLEncoder/NonConformingFloatEnc.abstract: Throw upon encountering non-conforming values. This is the default strategy.

Classes/XMLEncoder/NonConformingFloatEnc.name: convertToString(positiveInfinity:negativeInfinity:nan:)
Classes/XMLEncoder/NonConformingFloatEnc.abstract: Encode the values using the given representation strings.

Classes/XMLEncoder/DataEncodingStrategy..name: base64
Classes/XMLEncoder/DataEncodingStrategy..abstract: Encoded the Data as a Base64-encoded string. This is the default strategy.

Classes/XMLEncoder/DataEncodingStrategy..name: custom(_:)
Classes/XMLEncoder/DataEncodingStrategy..abstract: Encode the Data as a custom value encoded by the given closure.

Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..name: deferredToDate
Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..abstract: Defer to Date for choosing an encoding. This is the default strategy.

Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..name: secondsSince1970
Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..abstract: Encode the Date as a UNIX timestamp (as a JSON number).

Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..name: millisecondsSince1970
Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..abstract: Encode the Date as UNIX millisecond timestamp (as a JSON number).

Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..name: iso8601
Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..abstract: Encode the Date as an ISO-8601-formatted string (in RFC 3339 format).

Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..name: formatted(_:)
Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..abstract: Encode the Date as a string formatted by the given formatter.

Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..name: custom(_:)
Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..abstract: Encode the Date as a custom value encoded by the given closure.

Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..name: DateEncodingStrategy
Classes/XMLEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy..abstract: The strategy to use for encoding Date values.

Classes/XMLEncoder/DataEncodingStrategy..name: DataEncodingStrategy
Classes/XMLEncoder/DataEncodingStrategy..abstract: The strategy to use for encoding Data values.

Classes/XMLEncoder/NonConformingFloatEnc.name: NonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy
Classes/XMLEncoder/NonConformingFloatEnc.abstract: The strategy to use for non-JSON-conforming floating-point values (IEEE 754 infinity and NaN).

Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: dateEncodingStrategy
Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: The strategy to use in encoding dates. Defaults to .deferredToDate.

Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: dataEncodingStrategy
Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: The strategy to use in encoding binary data. Defaults to .base64.

Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: nonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy
Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: The strategy to use in encoding non-conforming numbers. Defaults to .throw.

Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: arrayEncodingStrategy
Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: The strategy to use for encoding Arrays

Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: dictionaryEncodingStrategy
Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: The strategy to use for encoding Dictionaries

Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: userInfo
Classes/XMLEncoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: Contextual user-provided information for use during encoding.

Classes/XMLDecoder/NonConformingFloatDec.name: throw
Classes/XMLDecoder/NonConformingFloatDec.abstract: Throw upon encountering non-conforming values. This is the default strategy.

Classes/XMLDecoder/NonConformingFloatDec.name: convertFromString(positiveInfinity:negativeInfinity:nan:)
Classes/XMLDecoder/NonConformingFloatDec.abstract: Decode the values from the given representation strings.

Classes/XMLDecoder/DataDecodingStrategy..name: custom(_:)
Classes/XMLDecoder/DataDecodingStrategy..abstract: Decode the Data as a custom value decoded by the given closure.

Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..name: deferredToDate
Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..abstract: Defer to Date for decoding. This is the default strategy.

Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..name: secondsSince1970
Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..abstract: Decode the Date as a UNIX timestamp from a JSON number.

Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..name: millisecondsSince1970
Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..abstract: Decode the Date as UNIX millisecond timestamp from a JSON number.

Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..name: iso8601
Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..abstract: Decode the Date as an ISO-8601-formatted string (in RFC 3339 format).

Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..name: formatted(_:)
Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..abstract: Decode the Date as a string parsed by the given formatter.

Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..name: custom(_:)
Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..abstract: Decode the Date as a custom value decoded by the given closure.

Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..name: DateDecodingStrategy
Classes/XMLDecoder/DateDecodingStrategy..abstract: The strategy to use for decoding Date values.

Classes/XMLDecoder/DataDecodingStrategy..name: DataDecodingStrategy
Classes/XMLDecoder/DataDecodingStrategy..abstract: The strategy to use for decoding Data values.

Classes/XMLDecoder/NonConformingFloatDec.name: NonConformingFloatDecodingStrategy
Classes/XMLDecoder/NonConformingFloatDec.abstract: The strategy to use for non-JSON-conforming floating-point values (IEEE 754 infinity and NaN).

Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: dateDecodingStrategy
Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: The strategy to use in decoding dates. Defaults to .deferredToDate.

Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: dataDecodingStrategy
Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: The strategy to use in decoding binary data. Defaults to .raw.

Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: nonConformingFloatDecodingStrategy
Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: The strategy to use in decoding non-conforming numbers. Defaults to .throw.

Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: arrayDecodingStrategy
Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: The strategy to use for encoding Arrays

Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: dictionaryDecodingStrategy
Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: The strategy to use for encoding Dictionaries

Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.name: userInfo
Classes/XMLDecoder.html#/s:11xml_encoder.abstract: Contextual user-provided information for use during decoding.

Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.name: attributes
Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.abstract: array of attributes attached to XML ELement

Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.name: namespaces
Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.abstract: array of namespaces attached to XML ELement

Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.name: stringValue
Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.abstract: return child text nodes all concatenated together

Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.name: addChild(_:)
Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.abstract: add a child node to the xml element

Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.name: insertChild(node:at:)
Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.abstract: insert a child node at position in the list of children nodes

Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.name: addAttribute(_:)
Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.abstract: add an attribute to an element. If one with this name already exists it is replaced

Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.name: addNamespace(_:)
Classes/XML/Element.html#/s:11xml_encode.abstract: add a namespace to an element. If one with this name already exists it is replaced

Classes/XML/Document.html#/s:11xml_encod.name: init(data:)
Classes/XML/Document.html#/s:11xml_encod.abstract: initialise with a block of XML data

Classes/XML/Document.html#/s:11xml_encod.name: init(xmlString:)
Classes/XML/Document.html#/s:11xml_encod.abstract: initialise with a string with XML data

Classes/XML/Document.html#/s:11xml_encod.name: setRootElement(_:)
Classes/XML/Document.html#/s:11xml_encod.abstract: set the root element of the document

Classes/XML/Node.html.name: Node
Classes/XML/Node.html.abstract: base class for all types of XML.Node

Classes/XMLDecoder.html.name: XMLDecoder
Classes/XMLDecoder.html.abstract: The wrapper class for decoding Codable classes from XMLElements

Classes/XMLEncoder.html.name: XMLEncoder
Classes/XMLEncoder.html.abstract: The wrapper class for encoding Codable classes to XMLElements
